channel.title: Argh! help plz!
channel.description:
argh! rite i went to skool this morning playing client in morning befor i went
came home
didnt bother logging on and now i wont to log on but my client has muckd up badly i have tryed to download my client again and i have the sam problem and it seems to b when i move my mouse over the client area this comes up and its not letting me login at all cant evan click on it+ the bar*to type witch server u wont to put in-music player all that lot dosent show up heres wat that message says
[code]Exception in thread "AWT-Windows" java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: sun.awt.SunToo lkit.getAppContext(Ljava/lang/Object;)Lsun/awt/AppContext; at sun.awt.SunToolkit.getAppContext(Native Method) at sun.awt.SunToolkit.targetToAppContext(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.windows.WComponentPeer.postEvent(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.windows.WComponentPeer.postPaintIfNecessary(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.windows.WComponentPeer.handleExpose(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.windows.WToolkit.eventLoop(Native Method) at sun.awt.windows.WToolkit.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
any info on how to sort would u so so helpful
*yes i know i cant spell very good*

item.title: Argh! help plz!
item.dc:creator: @looloo looloo
item.description:
@looloo wrote:

kk ill try ty
btw has any body els had this problem and if so how did u sort it

Read full topic

item.title: Argh! help plz!
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

try restarting your computer, well turn it off let it cool off for an hour then re-try it.

Read full topic
